title.rendered: Team ClinLab at the 17th Annual Wonderfund Golf Classic

content.rendered: Hopkinton, MA – On Monday April 29, 2019 some of ClinLab Staffing’s talented golfers participated in the 17th Annual Wonderfund Golf Classic presented by the Liberty Mutual Invitational at the Hopkinton Country Club. The event raises critical funds to help children involved with the Department of Children and Families access emergency items and enrichment opportunities. ClinLab Staffing was proud to participate in this event for the 5th year in a row!
